p: By GS analysis, Poonkodi et al. (2017) reported that the presence of several medicinally important terpenoids in essential oil of H. suaveolens which include sabinene, trans caryophyllene, E-spathulenol, Rimuene, 1,8-Cineole, Beta-Elemene, Eucaliptol, Bergamotol, Z-alpha-trans, alpha-Selinene, Caryophyllene oxide, and alpha-humulene [ 45].
